required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reduction Ratio and Clearance During Hemodialysis With MCO-filter Compared to HDF With Standard High-flux Filter
clinical_study.official_title: Reduction Ratio and Clearance of Middle Molecules During a Single Hemodialysis Session With Medium Cut-Off (MCO) Filter Compared to Hemodiafiltration (HDF) With Standard High-flux Filter

brief_summary.textblock:
The Medium Cut-Off dialysis (MCO) membrane has been developed to improve middle molecule removal compared to standard high-flux dialysis filters.
The major aim of this study is to compare the reduction ratio and clearance of middle molecules, during a single hemodialysis session with MCO-filter, compared to hemodiafiltration (HDF) with standard high-flux filter.
Secondary aims are to compare the reduction ratio and clearance of small and large molecules between the treatments.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction ratio (RR) of middle molecules (Beta-2-microglobulin, Cystatin C, Myoglobin, Beta-Trace Protein, Troponin T, Prealbumin)
primary_outcome.description: Reduction ratio during a 4h dialysis session. (Predialysis concentration - Postdialysis concentration)/Predialysis concentration*100%

primary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of middle molecules (Beta-2-microglobulin, Cystatin C, Myoglobin, Beta-Trace Protein, Troponin T, Prealbumin)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 30 minutes of dialysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of middle molecules (Beta-2-microglobulin, Cystatin C, Myoglobin, Beta-Trace Protein, Troponin T, Prealbumin)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 60 minutes of dialysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of middle molecules (Beta-2-microglobulin, Cystatin C, Myoglobin, Beta-Trace Protein, Troponin T, Prealbumin)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 120 minutes of dialysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of middle molecules (Beta-2-microglobulin, Cystatin C, Myoglobin, Beta-Trace Protein, Troponin T, Prealbumin)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 240 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: RR of large molecules (Albumin, Transferrin, IgG)
secondary_outcome.description: Reduction ratio during a 4h dialysis session. (Predialysis concentration - Postdialysis concentration)/Predialysis concentration*100%

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of large molecules (Albumin, Transferrin, IgG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 30 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of large molecules (Albumin, Transferrin, IgG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 60 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of large molecules (Albumin, Transferrin, IgG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 120 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of large molecules (Albumin, Transferrin, IgG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 240 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: RR of small molecules (Urea, Phosphate, Creatinine)
secondary_outcome.description: Reduction ratio during a 4h dialysis session. (Predialysis concentration - Postdialysis concentration)/Predialysis concentration*100%

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of small molecules (Urea, Phosphate, Creatinine)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 30 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of small molecules (Urea, Phosphate, Creatinine)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 60 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of small molecules (Urea, Phosphate, Creatinine)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 120 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance of small molecules (Urea, Phosphate, Creatinine)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Instantaneous arteriovenous clearance (ml/min) at 240 minutes of dialysis.

secondary_outcome.description: Number of adverse events during a 4h dialysis session

arm_group.description: Participants with ongoing HDF-treatments (>3months) will have measurements during an intervention with a 4h dialysis with MCO-HD, followed by 2 weeks of washout with ordinary HDF, thereafter measurements during a 4h dialysis with High-flux-HDF

Participants with ongoing HDF-treatments (>3months) will have measurements during a 4h dialysis with High-flux-HDF, followed by 2 weeks of washout with ordinary HDF, thereafter measurements during an intervention with a 4h dialysis with MCO-HD

intervention.description: Measurements will be done during a single hemodialysis session with Medium Cut-Off filter
Measurements will be done during a single hemodiafiltration session with standard high-flux filter

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Ongoing HDF treatment (>3 months)
- Albumin ≥ 30
- CRP <15
- No Acute Myocardial Infarction within 3 months.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not able to understand the study information.
